original_text: I know everything that you do. Look! I have opened a door that is in front of you. Nobody can shut that door. I know that you are not very strong. But you have obeyed what I told you. You have continued to believe in me.
korean_text: 볼지어다 내가 네 앞에 열린 문을 두었으되 능히 닫을 사람이 없으리라 내가 네 행위를 아노니 네가 작은 능력을 가지고서도 내 말을 지키며 내 이름을 배반하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: I know everything that you do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 하는 모든 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: I have opened a door that is in front of you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네 앞에 있는 문을 열었다
아무도 그 문을 닫을 수 없다

sentences.original_text: I know that you are not very strong
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네가 매우 강하지 않다는 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: But you have obeyed what I told you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 내가 너에게 말한 것을 순종했다

sentences.original_text: You have continued to believe in me
